name: Yiesha's Odyssey Ink Sample [AFNarratives]
description:
This is an ink sample for my games writing portfolio! Play as Yiesha, a young mage, and work with your allies to save a village from a bride-stealing demon!

NOTE: There should be two options for the first choice - "She's fine." and "She's very dependable." If only one appears, please restart the game! I'm unsure of what causes this issue, but restarting fixes it!

CREDITS

WRITING: AFNarratives (Adanna N.) 

ART: Poppliy (Shay S.) 

SPECIAL THANKS: Laynie, Irenae, Koi, Rowan, Gen, Kasey, and Ro for hearing me yell about it at 3 AM while I was coding! And Qadira and Kieran for being the best testers ever!

The script for this Ink game can be provided upon request! Please contact me at AFNarratives@gmail.com!
